title: YOLOv8 Pedestrian Detection Model
description: In real world applications such as autonomous driving and security surveillance, pedestrian detection is essential for ensuring safety and efficiency. These systems must perform reliably across a diverse range of conditions, from clear daylight images to lower quality visuals caused by noise, low light conditions or greyscale cameras. This project aimed to develop a pedestrian detection model using the YOLOv8 architecture, which is optimised for real-time performance and accuracy across a range of conditions.

title: Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman Key Exchange for ESP32
description: An implementation of elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) using Curve25519. It includes functions for key generation, scalar multiplication, and computing shared secrets. The implementation is designed for use with ESP32 microcontrollers.

title: Biggs-n-Bognar
description: My business website, showcasing our projects and skills. The website is designed to be a single page application with a rundown of our projects with a contact for business enquiries. The website is designed to be responsive and accessible to all users.

title: KJ Curtains and Nets
description: Website with custom curtain sizing for St.Austell based curtain and haberdashery shop

images.alt: Homepage of KJ Curtains and Nets

title: LoRa Mesh Network
description: A custom LoRa Mesh Network designed to allow for communication between multiple devices over long distances. Implemented on the Heltec LoRa ESP32 v3, it is used to establish a mesh network and send temperature readings between nodes and uploaded to an SQL database if a gateway node is present .The network is encryted using my custom Curve25519 Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman key exchange protocol with AES256 to ensure secure communication between devices.

images.alt: Heltec LoRa Module in Custom Case

title: Custom DEFLATE File Compression
description: An optimisation project of the DEFLATE file compression algorithm (the backbone of gzip), designed to combine LZ77 and Huffman Coding. The project aimed at using different data structures and optimisation techniques along with profiling to reduce execution time and memory usage.

title: Custom JSON Parser
description: A proof of concept custom JSON parser for my portfolio website. (Used to display this!)

title: Caelidh
description: Ceilidh is a roguelike dungeon crawler game based on Jack the giant slayer from Celtic mythology. Players will take on the role of Jack as they navigate through procedurally generated dungeons, fighting off monsters and collecting treasure along with a range of cards to expand your abilities!.

title: Raycaster with Phong Shading
description: A basic raycaster implementation in C++ with added Phong Shading for Diffusion, Specular and Ambient Lighting models

title: Genetic Algorithms for Pathfinding
description: A genetic algorithm implementation for pathfinding in a 2D grid. The algorithm is designed to find the shortest path to complete the entire grid, similar to the Travelling Salesman Problem. The algorithm uses a population of paths, which are then evolved over generations to find the optimal path.

images.alt: Graph of the agents fitness across generations

title: Cryptocurrency Visualiser
description: This project is designed to gather cryptocurrency prices from the internet using CryptoCompare's API and the UnityWebRequest module. The size of coins change depending on price and allow users to compare the prices of cryptos visually.

title: MPU6050 Gyroscope and Accelerometer Game with Kalman Filter
description: Space Game is a space invader-style game, where the player navigates a spaceship using gyroscope and accelerometer data. The goal of the game is to avoid hazards, while shooting oncoming asteroids using a button. The game is designed to make the player think about orientation and maintain control over the ship. The use of real-world sensor data adds an immersive element to the gameplay that provides a unique experience for the player.
